The Little Mermaid - because I love the sea and the idea of having a tail instead of legs would be very cool.
The Wizard of Oz - because I always liked the idea of a land over the rainbow where everyone is happy and nothing is bad.
The Three Little Pigs - because I like the idea of having a house made out of straw and bricks and being able to live in it.
The Frog Prince - because I like the idea of being able to turn into a frog and have a lot of fun.
The Little Match Girl - because I like the idea of being able to light matches and see the world in a different way.
